wisheshayen 1915 warshaye sinhala muslim aragalaya awasthawe sirabharayata ganna lada ape sinhala bauddha jana nayakayan wetha thama niweswalin aaharapana gena eeme awasaraya da labunu heyin walikada hira gedarata ema aahara gena yame awasthawa labune ekala wayasa dahaate tharunayakuwa siti jon layanaltaya.

thawath ayurakin pawasanawa nam adhirajyawadintath, eeta pakshapathithwaya dakwu shri lankikayantath ella kala athul paharaki.ema panathath samanga nida nonida siti saba helayo thama ayithin wenuwen satan karannatath ese satan karannan ha ekwa withi basinnatath nopakiliwa idiripath wuha.bandaranayaka shrimathanange shri lanka nidahas pakshaya wata mimasi podiyak men eekarashi wu jana ganga, lokayata eda kiyapawe, ee yatharthayayi.ratata awashyawa aththe sampradayika sithuwili thula kotu wu deshapalanagnyayan nowa, wega sima pasukaramin samaja peraliyak athi kala haki tharuna nayakayan bawa ohu hama witekama adahuweya.ema sugathigami chinthanaye swarnamaya mohotha uda wuye sanga, weda, guru, gowi, kamkaru yana pancha maha balawegayan eekarashiwa 1956 warshaye rata thula diyath kala maha harthalayen pasuwa elambai maha mathiwaranayen eksath jathika paksha aanduwa paradawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaya, wiplawakari sama samaja pakshaya, samastha lanka sinhala bhasha peramuna ha swadhina pudgalayangen sadumlath mahajana eksath peramunu aanduwak janathawa wisin thorapath kara ganimath samangaya.1956 warshaye aprel 12 wana dina shri lanka nidahas paksha nirmathru es. dab. aar. di. bandaranayaka shrimathanan shri lanka rajya manthrana sabhawe agramathyawaraya lesa diwurum dena ladi.ohuge palana kalaya thula rata wenuwen itukala pramukhathama karyayan athurin 1957 warshaye sinhala bhashawa rajya bhashawa lesa handunwa dimath, ethek brithanyaye ayithiyakwa pawathi katunayaka ha thrikunamala nawika hamuda kadawuru iwath kara ganna lesa brithanyayata bala kirimath, 1958 warshaye di bas janasathu kirimath, waraya janasathu kirimath dakwiya hakiya.

eranga krishanthi pranandu (upa nayika sabaragamuwa wishwawidyalaya), nauchali rajapaksha dewana pela (wame sita dakunata) ee.ee.si. sandunika, aar.es.di.es. abewikrama, ke.ee.bi.en. kulasuriya, ech.wayi. chamodi, ee.es.bi. wanninayaka, di.es. witharana, en.si. wirasuriya, ech.em. bihesha prasandi herath.
